page.title: 12TELEPHONE EXCHANGE
page.content: On Sanday we have our own small Telephone Exchange, situated near the school. Here, within the building, each in_coming and out_going call is registered. There are approximately {170 telephones}in Sanday. Over the last few years this has been added to by four or five within the year. Now most houses in Sanday have a telephone. The telephones have a 3 digit number starting from 200. The {telephone}which is{used the most}is the one in the{kiosk}down at {Kettletoft}pier. After that, most calls are made from people like the Vet and the Doctor. Up to{8 calls}can be made in Sanday{at any one time. The busiest time they are used is on a Tuesday morning:_ out-going calls for supplies, farm and shop business.
